# primer-design-using-primer3plus
Primer design for the BRCA1 gene using Primer3Plus, followed by primer parameter optimization and validation through NCBI BLAST.
  Gene BRCA1 Homo sapiens chromosome 17 

Gene of interest:-

>frw primer
GAGATGAGAGTGGGTCGCTG
>rev primer
GTTCAAGACCAGCCTGACCA
GAACTTTAAAAGTATAGAAAATGAATCCTTGTTCTCCATCCACT![](media/image1.jpg){width="6.3180555555555555in"
height="3.8125in"}

![](media/image2.jpg){width="6.5in" height="4.867361111111111in"}

-   PCR Primer Stats results

-   Global settings:

-   -The primers do not have a 5\'-phosphate group.

-   -Combined concentration of K+ and Na+ in the reaction = 50
    millimolar.

-   -Mg+2 concentration in the reaction = 1.5 millimolar.

-   -Primer concentration in the reaction = 200 nanomolar.

-   \-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\--

-   \-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\--

-   General properties:

-   \-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\--

    -   Primer name: frw

    -   Primer sequence: GAGATGAGAGTGGGTCGCTG

    -   Sequence length: 20

    -   Base counts: G=10; A=4; T=4; C=2; Other=0;

    -   GC content (%): 60.00

-   Molecular weight (Daltons): 6278.14

    -   nmol/A260: 4.94
